mainEntity.name: Are there additional charges like tolls and state taxes?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. When traveling from Uttar Pradesh to Bihar, a state entry tax is applicable. This, along with highway tolls, may be charged separately by some operators. Always clarify if these are included in your fare.

mainEntity.name: What is the best time to travel to Bodh Gaya?

acceptedAnswer.text: The best time to visit Bodh Gaya is during the winter months, from October to March, when the weather is pleasant. Major Buddhist festivals like Buddha Purnima also draw large crowds, so plan accordingly.

mainEntity.name: Can I book a multi-day Buddhist circuit tour from Varanasi?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, most operators offer multi-day packages that cover the full Buddhist circuit, including Bodh Gaya, Rajgir, Nalanda, and other significant sites. This is often more cost-effective than booking individual trips.
